_usage: This json file has the environment setup that is not to be changed per run.
_disclaimer: Testing is performed on a single set of values. Changing them might affect the functionality.
_options: All types and options are explained in BESSPIN-Tool-Suite/besspin/base/utils/configData.json
_testsInfo: testsInfo are supposed to have the following settings per test: cweText

test_1037.cweText: Processor Optimization Removal or Modification of Security-critical Code

test_1050.cweText: Excessive Platform Resource Consumption within a Loop

test_1189.cweText: Improper Isolation of Shared Resources on System-on-Chip (SoC)

test_1193.cweText: Power-On of Untrusted Execution Core Before Enabling Fabric Access Control

test_1221.cweText: Incorrect Register Defaults or Module Parameters

test_1222.cweText: Insufficient Granularity of Address Regions Protected by Register Locks

test_1224.cweText: Improper Restriction of Write-Once Bit Fields

test_1231.cweText: Improper Implementation of Lock Protection Registers

test_1232.cweText: Improper Lock Behavior After Power State Transition

test_1233.cweText: Improper Hardware Lock Protection for Security Sensitive Controls

test_1234.cweText: Hardware Internal or Debug Modes Allow Override of Locks

test_1240.cweText: Use of a Risky Cryptographic Primitive

test_1241.cweText: Use of Predictable Algorithm in Random Number Generator

test_1242.cweText: Inclusion of Undocumented Features or Chicken Bits

test_1243.cweText: Exposure of Security-Sensitive Fuse Values During Debug

test_1245.cweText: Improper Finite State Machines (FSMs) in Hardware Logic

test_1246.cweText: Improper Write Handling in Limited-write Non-Volatile Memories

test_1252.cweText: CPU Hardware Not Configured to Support Exclusivity of Write and Execute Operations

test_1256.cweText: Hardware Features Enable Physical Attacks from Software

test_1257.cweText: Improper Access Control Applied to Mirrored or Aliased Memory Regions

test_1260.cweText: Improper Handling of Overlap Between Protected Memory Ranges

test_1261.cweText: Improper Handling of Single Event Upsets

test_1262.cweText: Register Interface Allows Software Access to Sensitive Data or Security Settings

test_1264.cweText: Hardware Logic with Insecure De-Synchronization between Control and Data Channels

test_1268.cweText: Agents Included in Control Policy are not Contained in Less-Privileged Policy

test_1271.cweText: Missing Known Value on Reset for Registers Holding Security Settings

test_1274.cweText: Insufficient Protections on the Volatile Memory Containing Boot Code

test_1276.cweText: Hardware Block Incorrectly Connected to Larger System

test_1279.cweText: Cryptographic Primitives used without Successful Self-Test

test_1280.cweText: Access Control Check Implemented After Asset is Accessed

test_1281.cweText: Sequence of Processor Instructions Leads to Unexpected Behavior (Halt and Catch Fire)

test_1282.cweText: Assumed-Immutable Data Stored in Writable Memory

test_1283.cweText: Mutable Attestation or Measurement Reporting Data
